title: Bug 7752: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., "foo.txt").
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose Zip File.
4. In the "Export" dialog window, select both projects, give the zip file a name (e.g., "test.zip"), and start the export.

Observed Behavior:

Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails in the following way:

An error message box pops up stating that problems were encountered during export. The details in the error message specify that the file with the same name in project 2 is the issue.

Expected Behavior:

Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file should succeed without any errors or issues.

Steps to Reproduce:

Please follow the steps outlined in the "Steps to reproduce" section.
